title: [K-12] Beginner Chinese Character Education Module Using Multimodal Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: No basic Chinese character recognition, but capable of using digital devices
context.additional_context: An educational program for adult learners in response to the expansion of Malaysia-China economic cooperation.

learning_goals: Learners can write over 100 basic Chinese characters following the correct stroke order.
Learners can read the learned Chinese characters at a conversational level in daily life.
Learners can integrate multimodal learning strategies, including visual (graphics), auditory (pronunciation), and tactile (writing) modalities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
